narrative.narrative: Tobago Express was an airline around from June 24th,2001 to September 30th,2007 when it merged into Caribbean Airlines. Caribbean had owned 45% of it since the start with the rets being private investors, but it acquired 100$ of it in September 2007 and merged them into Caribbean. Its base was on the island of Tobago with a flight 83km to the island of Trinidad and its main city of Port of Spain, these two islands make up the country of Trinidad and Tobago. It also flew seasonally from Port of Spain to Bridgetown,Barbados and Grenada. It began with one Bombardier Dash 8-300 but had five by the end of 2003. It had the same five at the time of the merger.
